Geography: Mid-Atlantic, New York, New York, United States
Credit Line: Purchase, Bequest of Maud S. Swords, by exchange, 2009
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: The United States and Canada, 1800–1900 A.D.
Provenance: Ian Simmonds, dealer of American glass, offered the decanters to the Museum in 2009.  Simmonds purchased the decanters from a dealer in Pennsylvania.
